# Eldritch Conduit, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Witch Spells|Witch 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a small mirror)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Inner Sea Magic, pg. 54

This spell functions like *[[Eldritch Conduit (Spell)|eldritch conduit]]* save for the differences listed above and that the target must be within medium range (100 ft. + 10 ft./level) in order for you to use the conduit. Using a creature as a conduit for a spell ends the greater eldritch conduit effect on that creature, but does not end the effect for other eldritch conduits.
